LanguageData.MFI_ticksToUpgrade: Time until pirates upgrade their outposts to bases
LanguageData.MFI_LetterBanditOutpostUpgraded: Pirates from {0} have upgraded a nearby outpost of theirs to a base!\n\nThey'll sent out occasional raiding parties to test your defences, and to settle new outposts that may become bases.
LanguageData.MFI_TraderSent: {0} thanks you. Their trade carravan will arrive in about {1}.
